body_html:
Thank you for the patch.

You should squash your two commits into one using git rebase -i since the first commit is incorrect (it confused me at first.

Also, there is an internal committed change that will be sync'd soon that adds a
tensorflow/tools/git/gen_git_source.sh. It would be great if you could make the change to that (which is used for the Makefile case to avoid the python dependency).

body:
Thank you for the patch.

You should squash your two commits into one using `git rebase -i` since the first commit is incorrect (it confused me at first.

Also, there is an internal committed change that will be sync'd soon that adds a 
`tensorflow/tools/git/gen_git_source.sh`. It would be great if you could make the change to that (which is used for the Makefile case to avoid the python dependency).
